reviewText: The program content is terrific and easily worth five stars.  This is really one of the best in Mr. Baer's travelogues.  But the DVD is mastered in letterbox format for old square televisions, which means there is a large black border on all four sides of the image when viewed on today's 16:9 displays.
I love all of Geoffrey Baer's tours, this was very interesting and informative as usual.
Great and Informative with more account and historical known and unknown history.  Wish I could order more of this DVD
